posts._title: Teruo Ishii – Nyotai sanbashi aka Flesh Pier (1958)
posts.title: Nyotai sanbashi
posts.excerpt: Quote:Director Teruo Ishi’s crime action follows the investigative adventures of an undercover cop working with a prostitution ring. It’s done in an unique documentary style

posts._title: Marcin Wrona – Czlowiek magnes AKA Magnet Man (2001)
posts.title: Czlowiek magnes
posts.excerpt: Quote:The film is inspired by the director’s unusual family history, which evokes childhood memories marked by specific relationships with parents. Quote:A true story about the filmmaker’s father, a mesmerist, exorcist, and healer who can help everyone but himself. Told from the point of view of his young son (the filmmaker as a boy), who both …

posts.title: Rabbit Fire
posts.excerpt: Quote:Daffy Duck and Bugs argue back and forth whether it is duck season or rabbit season. The object of their arguments is hunter Elmer Fudd.

posts.title: Rabbit Seasoning
posts.excerpt: Quote:Daffy Duck tricks Elmer Fudd into believing it’s rabbit season; but Bugs Bunny uses a female disguise and faulty pronouns to fight back.

posts.title: Duck! Rabbit, Duck!
posts.excerpt: Quote:The final installment of the “Hunting Trilogy” once again has Elmer out hunting, while Bugs and Daffy try to con him into shooting the other.

posts._title: Kamila Andini – Sekala Niskala aka The Seen and Unseen (2017)
posts.title: Sekala Niskala
posts.excerpt: One day in a hospital room, 10-year-old Tantri realises she will not have much more time with her twin brother Tantra. Tantra’s brain is weakening and he has begun to lose his senses one by one. He now spends most of his time lying in bed, while Tantri has to accept the reality that she …

posts._title: Jack Cutting & Clyde Geronimi – Ugly Duckling (1939)
posts.title: Ugly Duckling
posts.excerpt: Quote:A newborn cygnet searches for a family that will accept him.

posts.title: The Ugly Duckling
posts.excerpt: Quote:A black duckling is rejected by its mother, a hen, but manages to prove his worth when a tornado threatens the hen’s chicks.

posts.title: Ága
posts.excerpt: Quote:In a yurt on the snow-covered fields of the North, Nanook and Sedna live following the traditions of their ancestors. Alone in the wilderness, they look like the last people on Earth. Nanook and Sedna’s traditional way of life starts changing – slowly, but inevitably. Hunting becomes more and more difficult, the animals around them …

posts._title: Masayuki Suo – Shiko funjatta AKA Sumo Do, Sumo Don’t (1992)
posts.title: Shiko funjatta
posts.excerpt: Synopsis:Kyoritsu University’s sumo club is in danger of being shut down after years of failure and general disinterest. The hopeless Aoki (a hilarious performance by Naoto Takenaka) is the sole remaining member of the school’s once proud sumo team. At the start of a new school year, however, Professor Anayama (Akira Emoto) manages to recruit …
